title: emacs: broken syntax highlighting for raw strings
body:
This is using the revision 656591eaf189 as submitted here:
https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?spec=svn656591eaf189e1bfa0f962cd63d1fd3f84dec2af&;r=656591eaf189e1bfa0f962cd63d1fd3f84dec2af

What steps will reproduce the problem?

Paste this program into an emacs buffer: http://play.golang.org/p/Fhj1pactrG

What is the expected output?

Expect each `\` to be rendered in string font.

What do you see instead?

The text from the first ` in the first `\` through to the first ` in the second `\` is
rendered in string font.  Emacs is interpreting \` as an escaped backquote.

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?

Which operating system are you using?

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')

Please provide any additional information below.
